page.title: 13CHILDRENS GAMES - BULLDOGS
page.content: BRITISH BULLDOGS is a game that can be played with any number of players but preferably more than six, this is how you play it. You have two markers about 15 metres apart. Then one person is chosen to stand in the middle of the markers. All the players line up behind one of the markers. The person in the middle chases one of the other people to try and dodge past him.If he is succesful and reaches the other marker the rest of the people try to get past him also.But if he is not succesful,he has to stay in the middle.Then together they chase another person and the game goes on and on until they are all caught.
